channel.title: mal tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from mal.

item.description: @ibogost I like mine... it's got 5 levels of boost plus, none, and at 1 its about like riding a regular bike that doesn't weigh 70 lbs. Also a throttle. Drive my kid to/from school on the back. https://t.co/5Im6GnBYct
item.source:markdown: @ibogost I like mine... it's got 5 levels of boost plus, none, and at 1 its about like riding a regular bike that doesn't weigh 70 lbs. Also a throttle. Drive my kid to/from school on the back. https://t.co/5Im6GnBYct

item.description: @JaniceMcGeachin oh brother. if you won you'd be all for it.
